title: Rihanna eats french fries at LA Lakers basketball game in LA
text:
Rihanna and her bestie Melissa Forde were spotted enjoying the Los Angeles Lakers game on Friday (Picture: Getty Images)

Nothing makes watching sports match better than having a drink and eating some good food, just ask Rihanna.

The basketball lover was spotted courtside at the LA Lakers game at the Staples Centre on Friday night and fans loved seeing the singer chomping on some fries with her BFF Melissa Forde.

In a clip quickly shared on Twitter, the duo seemed to be somewhat distracted from the game in a clip as they discussed their yummy meal.

‘Rihanna watching LeBron at the Laker game while eatin French fries unbothered. A queen,’ one fan wrote.

‘Rihanna is courtside at the Laker game, sharing fries with her homegirl. I stan,’ another added.

‘rihanna has gone to the fries” – the greatest moment in commentating history,’ another fan stated.

Rihanna watching LeBron at the Laker game while eatin French fries unbothered A queen pic.twitter.com/NcfIunT04A — Tony Clements (@TonyClementsTC) October 26, 2019

As many fans know, Rih is a big fan of LeBron James and the basketball star didn’t let her down on the night as his team beat the Utah Jazz 95 – 86.

The Fenty Beauty mogul slayed in a typically luxe streetwear look as she bravely rocked a cream and white ensemble.

Rihanna was very into the match as she cheered on her fave, LeBron James (Picture: Getty Images)

Rihanna was pleased with the results as her team won the match (Picture: BACKGRID)

But then again, we can’t imagine Rihanna being the kinda gal who avoid wearing light colours for fear of getting stains on them.

The savvy business woman decided clothes weren’t necessary in her lastest Instagram post.

Friday saw the release of the catchily titled Rihanna book, a 500 page work of art weighing 15 pounds that contains previously unseen photographs and memories from Rihanna’s life.

And the Diamonds singer decided to celebrate the launch of the luxury visual autobiography in the most Rihanna way possible: with a tasteful nude portrait.
